subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Davydenko and Igor Andreev beat Radek Stepanek and Pavel Vizner, 3-6, 6-3, 7-5, 6-4, giving Russia a 2-1 lead against the Czech Republic in its Davis Cup quarterfinal in Moscow.
snippet: Nikolay Davydenko and Igor Andreev beat Radek Stepanek and Pavel Vizner, 3-6, 6-3, 7-5, 6-4, giving Russia a 2-1 lead against the Czech Republic in its Davis Cup quarterfinal in Moscow.
